tags.description: Generate domain-level threat reports or get feedback about a domain.
tags.name: Feedback reports

get.description: Returns feedback information about a domain based on the feedback type.

parameters.description: Optionally filter by a dimension of data. Refer to [Filters](ref:filters) for a complete list.
parameters.name: dimension

parameters.description: The specified dimension value. Refer to [Filters](ref:filters) for a complete list.
parameters.name: dimensionValue

parameters.description: The type of feedback to query.
parameters.name: feedbackType

schema.description: Feedback details for a reported threat.

accountName.description: Name of the account with feedback.

ackMailSentTime.description: __Read-only__ ISO 8601 timestamp marking receipt of email acknowledgment.

avcInfo.description: Details of AVC info related to IOC.

appId.description: Unique identifier for the application's AVC category.

categoryId.description: A unique identifier for the category.

operations.description: List of operations for the IOC AVC event.

riskId.description: A unique identifier for the risk category.

currentCategory.description: The threat security category. Either `Malware`, `Phishing`, `C&C`, `DNS Exfiltration`, `Risky domains`, or `File sharing`.

customerEmailId.description: __Read-only__ The email address of the contract's customer.

dimension.description: The dimension to assign to the threat.

reportedTime.description: __Read-only__ ISO 8601 timestamp marking the feedback report.

submittedBy.description: The name of the user who submitted the feedback.

threatOpsNotifiedTime.description: __Read-only__ ISO 8601 timestamp marking when Akamai Ops received notification about the threat.

value.title: Bad Request
value.detail: The system cannot understand your request.  Please check the syntax and correct any problems.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to the problem.

errors.description: A list of HTTP problem details. The error response includes this list if there are several problems with a single request, to call out each of them separately.

items.description: A nested problem response error object.

instance.description: The URI for this error occurrence.

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to the problem.

errors.description: A list of HTTP problem details. The error response includes this list if there are several problems with a single request, to call out each of them separately.

items.description: A nested problem response error object.

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type.

status.description: The HTTP status code generated by the origin server.

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type.

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type.

parameters.description: A unique identifier for each configuration.
parameters.name: configId
